title: (x) Tattoo Magazine cover: Tuscan-style caps w/ ligatures, bold sans-serif - various alternatives, Futura {Simon R, Florian}
content:
Does anyone know the font used for tattoo magazine covers?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_6121.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/typophile.com/files/1_30.jpg) | 52.87 KB |
author: tattoosamy

comments.content: I'm not sure the logo is a font... but the rest looks like [Futura Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/futura/extra-bold/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DWEST%2520COAST%2520INK%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D31).

Hi Sam,  
welcome to Typophile!  
Running a search for [Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/tuscan/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTATTOO%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D%26seed%3D13) might be a good starting point. I agree with Simon that this is most likely a custom logo. Here are a few related typefaces: [Saloon Girl](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/saloon-girl/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTATTOO%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D%26seed%3D28), [Maverickâ€™s Luck](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/mavericks-luck/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTATTOO%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D%26seed%3D0.9811737430281937), [Waxahachie WBW](http://web.archive.org/web/20110308210333/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/waxahachie-wbw/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTATTOO%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D%26seed%3D33).  
F
